---
name: Pre-Discussed and Approved Topics
about: |-
  Only for topics already discussed and approved in a GitHub Discussion or on Slack.
---

**DO NOT OPEN A NEW ISSUE UNLESS YOU HAVE DISCUSSED IT WITH THE JANK TEAM AHEAD
OF TIME. FOR NEW TOPICS, BUG REPORTS, FEATURE REQUESTS, ETC PLEASE USE GITHUB DISCUSSIONS.**

You can create a new Github Discussion here: https://github.com/jank-lang/jank/discussions/new/choose

----
If you have been asked to make an issue, for an actionable task, you may delete
all of this and proceed to create the issue.
